metadata.description: The sewers of NYC have always been home to the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles... but what else has been nesting in the deep dark? A series of strange occurrences leads the Turtles into long forgotten tunnels. What they find there should have been left alone, for as light fades and walls narrow-- bone chilling terror awaits!
metadata.name: Infestation 2: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
